reviews.name: S.O.S. Steel Wool Soap Pads, 18 Count
reviews.reviewText: This is a GREAT, PRODUCT! Its like Magic. It sure does remove the stove stains! Its good for ONLY a 1 TIME USE. THEN TO BE THROWN AWAY!
reviews.title: *Great Product*

reviews.name: S.O.S. Steel Wool Soap Pads, 18 Count
reviews.reviewText:
I love these SOS pads. When we moved in to our house it had a used
glass top stove that was not taken care of.
It had horrible marks on it where food had been burnt on to it. I worked
for weeks trying to get them off.
Last resort with nothing to use, I started to use a sos pad on it
using it in circular motions a bit at a time for a few days,
Finally all the marks and burnt on marks are gone. And there were a lot of
them. This was cheaper then buying a new stove because I could not stand the looks
of this one.
reviews.title: Love this product

reviews.name: S.O.S. Steel Wool Soap Pads, 18 Count
reviews.reviewText: Been using SOS brand for many years. Once in awhile I will try another brand but they never live up to SOS. They get the job done that's for sure. To keep them from getting 'rusty', I place them on top of an airy plastic scrubby pad and it works great. Still my favorite brand of steel wool soap pad out there. Highly recommend!
reviews.title: Still the best around

reviews.name: S.O.S. Steel Wool Soap Pads, 18 Count
reviews.reviewText: Great for cleaning baked on food on enamel stovetops and for stainless steel cookware. Not recommended for non-stick surfaces. Have also used on glass baking dishes to remove baked on food particles.
reviews.title: 17 April 2013

reviews.name: S.O.S. Steel Wool Soap Pads, 18 Count
reviews.reviewText: Sos gets the job done the 1st time!
reviews.title: SOS cleaning pads
